thread.title: Man attacks Midlothian woman with a knife while she gets her mail, police say
thread.title_full: Man attacks Midlothian woman with a knife while she gets her mail, police say

author: Kate McCann
title: Man attacks Midlothian woman with a knife while she gets her mail, police say
text:
Man attacks Midlothian woman with a knife while she gets her mail, police say Kate McCann Daily Southtown Privacy Policy 
Midlothian police were searching for a man who allegedly attacked a woman with a knife while she collected her mail, officials said. 
While at a mailbox she was grabbed from behind and a man ordered her "shut her . . . mouth" and then cut her skin with a knife, police said. He then pushed the woman to the ground, they added. 
As the woman started to stand up, the man allegedly punched her in the face, causing her head to hit a brick wall, Midlothian police said. 
The man then fled on foot. The woman went back upstairs to her apartment and called the police, officials said. The woman was treated at Palos Community Hospital. 
The attacker is described as about 6-feet tall and an unknown weight. He also was wearing a black North Face jacket, blue jeans and black shoes. The victim was treated at Palos Community Hospital. 
Kate McCann is a freelance reporter for the Daily Southtown.
